com.opentok.android
Interface Publisher.Listener

Enclosing class:
Publisher
public static interface Publisher.Listener

Monitors state changes in a Publisher object.

Method Summary

          Invoked when a publisher changes active camera.
 void onPublisherException(OpentokException exception)
          Invoked when a publisher failed.
 void onPublisherStreamingStarted()
          Invoked when the publisher has successfully begun streaming to an OpenTok media server.
 void onPublisherStreamingStopped()
          Invoked when a publisher has disconnected, usually as a result of a call to Session.unpublish().
